attributes.action: Do not increase the financial requirements for family visas.
attributes.additional_details: such a huge increase is going to tear families apart. Stopping loved ones from being together. There is no justification for doing this
attributes.background: Family visas: The minimum threshold for a family visa will also be raised to £38,700 to "ensure people only bring dependants whom they can support financially". Currently, it stands at the 2012 rate of £18,600.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
